name: Dino Hunt (Jhoper)
description:
Survive as long as you can. Use the scattered bomb if you get too overwhelmed.

Story: Hunter finds an unknown cute creature and wants one as a trophy. He finds out that he got more than what he bargained for and is overwhelmed by the population of the cute creatures. The Hunters main source of protection is a tranquilizer gun which awakens a vicious side of the creatures.
